meanings.sent1: After missing his flight, he rebooked his ticket for the next available one.
meanings.sent2: She rebooked her hotel room for the following weekend.
meanings.sent3: The forgetful traveler had to rebook his journey multiple times.
meanings.sent4: The author rebooked her characters into a new adventure.
meanings.sent5: The student rebooked her study session to ensure she was fully prepared.

meanings.sent1: They rebooked their table at the restaurant for a later time.
meanings.sent2: The couple rebooked their honeymoon suite for the next month.
meanings.sent3: The cat rebooked its spot on the sunny windowsill.
meanings.sent4: The actor rebooked his role in the upcoming play.
meanings.sent5: The family rebooked their vacation to a different destination.

meanings.sent1: The rebooked flight was set for the evening departure.
meanings.sent2: The rebooked meeting was now planned for next week.
meanings.sent3: The rebooked train ride was delayed due to track maintenance.
meanings.sent4: The rebooked event was eagerly anticipated by all attendees.
meanings.sent5: The rebooked appointment was marked on the calendar for the new date.
